m_szDocTitle: 8,000+ Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV Sales In 3 Months | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 8,000+ Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV Sales In 3 Months Originally published on Gas2 . While the fortunes of Mitsubishi Motors might seem in doubt here in America, over in Europe the just-launched Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV has become something of an overnight success story. Since it went on sale in October of 2013, the Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV has moved over 8,000 units, with orders for another 11,000 still in the books.
